modid.midnightconfig.title: Skyblock Enhancements
modid.midnightconfig.showMissingEnchantm: Show Missing Enchantments in the tooltip of an item.
Show Missing Enchantments in the tooltip of an item.
modid.midnightconfig.showWhenPressingShi: Only show Missing Enchantments when pressing shift

Only show Missing Enchantments when pressing shift. 
Setting this to false makes missing Enchantments always visible
